TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IEnumerable
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IEnumerable

remarks.para: This class implements the .NET Framework's IEnumerable interface that is required for data binding and iterating collections. It also provides a Count property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of items in the collection.
Docs.value: Integer representing the number of items in the collection.

remarks.para: If the collection uses data paging, this property returns the count of the current set of paged data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through this CollectionBase instance.
Docs.returns: An IEnumerator interface used to iterate the CollectionBase object.

remarks.para: GetEnumerator is a method that implements the foreach statement (For Each in Visual Basic). You do not need to call this method directly. This method implements the .NET Framework IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method. See the .NET Framework SDK for documentation about the IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method.
